title: Project-Based Team Learning for Educational Software Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming skills and understanding of pedagogical principles
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen educational software development capabilities. Requires mobile-friendly design feasible in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Complete a team project applying the educational software development process.
Develop a learning scenario-based app by integrating instructional design theory and software engineering principles.
Collaboratively implement and present a prototype that solves real-world educational problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
